statements: SELECT `banned-on` FROM default:tags WHERE `banned-on` IS NOT MISSING ORDER BY `banned-on`
SELECT `banned-on` FROM default:tags WHERE `banned-on` IS NOT NULL ORDER BY `banned-on`
SELECT `banned-on` FROM default:tags WHERE `banned-on` IS NULL ORDER BY `banned-on`
SELECT details.actors AS actors FROM default:catalog WHERE details.actors[0] = "Jessica Chastain" ORDER BY actors
SELECT asin, title FROM default:catalog WHERE type = "Movies&TV" and title LIKE "Sherlock%" ORDER BY asin
SELECT asin, title FROM default:catalog WHERE type = "Movies&TV" and tags[1] LIKE "english" ORDER BY asin
SELECT title, tags FROM default:catalog WHERE tags = ["new release", "english", "movie"] ORDER BY title
SELECT name FROM default:tags WHERE length(name) > 10 ORDER BY name
SELECT name FROM default:contacts AS contact WHERE contact.name = "dave" ORDER BY name
SELECT dimensions.height FROM default:catalog WHERE pricing.list = 799 ORDER BY dimensions.height
SELECT asin, title, tags[1] FROM default:catalog WHERE tags[1] NOT LIKE "english" ORDER BY asin
SELECT title FROM default:catalog WHERE (ANY genre IN details.genre SATISFIES genre = "Crime"  END AND ANY tags in tags SATISFIES tags = "english" END) AND  pricing.pct_savings > 10.55 ORDER BY title
SELECT title FROM default:catalog WHERE (EVERY genre IN details.genre SATISFIES length(genre) > 5 END) ORDER BY title

SELECT title FROM default:catalog WHERE (ANY genre IN details.genre SATISFIES genre = "Crime" END AND ANY tags IN tags SATISFIES tags = "english" END) AND NOT (pricing.pct_savings < 15) ORDER BY title
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS NOT VALUED ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS VALUED ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS NULL ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS NOT MISSING ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE `shipped-on` IS MISSING ORDER BY id
SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE name <> "dave" ORDER BY name
SELECT score FROM default:game WHERE score <= 8 ORDER BY score
SELECT score FROM default:game WHERE score >= 10 ORDER BY score
SELECT name FROM default:contacts WHERE name = "dave" OR name = "earl" ORDER BY name
SELECT catalog.asin FROM default:catalog WHERE dimensions = { "height": 1.2, "length": 2, "width": 1.5 } AND details.genre = [ "Crime", "Thriller" ] ORDER BY catalog.asin

SELECT profile_details.user_id, profile_details.loyalty, personal_details.age FROM default:user_profile WHERE (profile_details.loyalty.loyalty_score > 6 AND profile_details.loyalty.loyalty_score < 9) AND (LENGTH(profile_details.loyalty.friends_referred) > 1 OR (profile_details.loyalty.reward_points + profile_details.loyalty.reward_points) > 900) OR  ( (personal_details.age > 55 OR personal_details.age < 20) AND profile_details.prefs.promotion_email = True) OR profile_details.loyalty.board_member = True ORDER BY profile_details.user_id
SELECT title FROM default:catalog WHERE (EVERY gen IN details.genre SATISFIES length(gen) > 5 END) ORDER BY title
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE ANY product IN ARRAY ol.productId FOR ol IN orderlines END SATISFIES product == "tea111" END ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE EVERY product IN ARRAY ol.productId FOR ol IN orderlines END SATISFIES product <> "tea111" END ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM default:orders WHERE EVERY product IN ARRAY ol.productId FOR ol IN orderlines END SATISFIES product != "tea111" END ORDER BY id

description: ALL expression referring to outer context
statements: SELECT name, children FROM default:contacts WHERE EVERY child IN children SATISFIES child.name > name END ORDER BY name
